memberdef.name: yuv_cases
memberdef.initializer:
= { #define FMT(x) { FMT(YUV420), yuv420_create_buffer }, { FMT(NV12), nv12_create_buffer }, { FMT(YUYV), yuyv_create_buffer }, { FMT(XYUV8888), xyuv8888_create_buffer },
}

memberdef.argsstring: (struct client *client, size_t bytes, int width, int height, int stride_bytes, uint32_t drm_format)
memberdef.name: yuv_buffer_create
